license.name: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International

items.name: Machine-Learning
items.description: This repository contain the code in which different built in frameworks of python is used to understand the basic concepts of Supervised Machine Learning and how it is implemented using built frameworks of python

items.name: mlops-workload-orchestrator
items.description: The MLOps Workload Orchestrator solution helps you streamline and enforce architecture best practices for machine learning (ML) model productionization. This solution is an extendable framework that provides a standard interface for managing ML pipelines for AWS ML services and third-party services.

items.name: machine-learnining-computer-vision-projecs
items.description: This repository showcases the machine learning (computer vision) projects I've worked on over the past year. It highlights my ability to use frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and more to tackle real-world problems. The repository serves as a comprehensive overview of my skills and recent accomplishments in the field.

items.name: dsti_goodreads_rating_predictions
items.description: Using machine learning to predict Goodreads ratings. Follows the Kedro framework

items.name: PhiFlow
items.description: A differentiable PDE solving framework for machine learning

items.name: ApraPipes
items.description: A pipeline framework for developing video and image processing application. Supports multiple GPUs and Machine Learning tooklits

items.name: aiko_services
items.description: Distributed service framework using asynchronous messages supporting IoT, Machine Learning and Video

items.name: IL-Research-in-PSCs
items.description: All machine learning frameworks and codes from IL Research in PSCs

items.name: Fake-Social-Media-Profile-Detection
items.description: Fake Social Media Profile Detection  is a machine learning project designed to identify and detect fake social media profiles. Leveraging Django for the web application framework and TensorFlow/Keras for building and training neural networks, this project aims to provide a robust solution for distinguishing genuine profiles from fake ones.

items.name: Geochemistrypi
items.description: an open-sourced highly automated machine learning Python framework for data-driven geochemistry discovery

items.name: used-car-price-prediction-crispdm
items.description: Analysis and prediction of used car prices using machine learning models following the CRISP-DM framework.

items.name: sAIfe
items.description: Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning Application and Pipeline Security-Focused Development Framework

items.name: PerfVec
items.description: A generalizable machine learning-based performance modeling framework.
